Class: KandinskyImg2ImgPipeline. It's a pipeline for image-to-image generation using Kandinsky model. Inherits DiffusionPipeline. It uses text encoder, tokenizer, scheduler, UNet, VQ model. Methods: __call__, __init__, _encode_prompt, add_noise, get_timesteps, prepare_latents. So summary: pipeline that transforms input image and text prompt into new image using diffusion, encoding prompts, adding noise, preparing latents, etc.

Business intent: Provide AI-powered image editing / generation service for applications like creative design, marketing, content creation, etc.

Keywords: image-to-image generation, diffusion, text-guided, Kandinsky, AI, pipeline, latent preparation, noise addition, prompt encoding, VQ model, UNet, scheduler.

Summary: "A diffusion-based pipeline that takes an input image and a textual description to produce a modified image, leveraging a multilingual text encoder, tokenizer, scheduler, conditional UNet, and a VQ image codec."
